answers.answer: Im sorry ): i had tobe monitored for 4 hours the other day and went crazy sitting there, i camt imagine wjat your going through! Amd then it doesnt help when no one answers on here!
Why do u comment bump on everoned posts

I'm stuck in the hospital for another week for previa bleeding. This is my second stay. I agree the hospital is boring and uncomfortable. They start bugging you at 6 am and ask of you slept well. No, you were just here at 4 am for something else and midnight before that. Lol

Aww I know the feeling I was on bed rest at the hospital.. I started off hating the food and ended up loving it.. Only a few more days.. I do not miss bed rest that's for sure.  I took a bunch of stuff with me
Oh my gosh.  I'd go crazy too.   I guess I'd spend time reading, watching movies,    what about a puzzle?  Or do you like crafts?  Like a latch hook rug or a bead craft or something.
Maybe you could read a book to pass the time

I have a huge latch hook I started at home but once I got to about 20 weeks or so I couldn't sit comfortably and work on it anymore without my legs going numb within 2 secs. I was woken up at 530 n been up since with a pounding headache n waiting for breakfast since 745. Thank god I'll have my body pillow by the end of the day.
No apps on your phone or device for you to enjoy?

I've been in the hospital since October 8 and my induction is scheduled for December 1 so thay will be two months in here.  I feel so confined I read do my online schoolwork watch movies on the computer crossword puzzles I have visitors every now and then so those couple of days you are there should be a cake walk.  Im so ready to go home to my family it ridiculous!!! I have 26 days to go and im looking forward to putting this behind me.  My husband has been very supportive he brings me dinner every night and spends the night every night so that is a plus!!! Hang in there
My due date is Dec 1st but was to b induced Nov 24th cuz im high risk living 2 hrs away from hospital then got switched to Nov 9th in a matter of 5-10 mins of being in the Dr office Monday.

Im in the hospital too for preeclampsia. Only I have been here since oct 22. Im 31 wks And will be here until 36 wks. Your stay is shorter than mine. Don't feel bad. You'll be done before you know it.

question: I'm 36 weeks n 1 day... admitted till I'm 37 bc preeclampsia n being induced Monday! Absolutely nothing on tv stupid hospital bed is making me more sore then just pregnancy issues n swelling is horrible!! Food is good but I get too full before I finish my tray. Miss my two year old n just wanna b home in my own bed comfy with a body pillow. N I feel like a pincushion gotten labs done 3 times in just two days n I'll b here at least another week including days after baby is born. Any other moms bored in the hospital??
title: Soo bored in the hospital. Hospital Mommies?!?!
